name: Markpurser.github.io
body:
## About
Hi, I'm a software developer currently working at [Elekta Oncology Systems](http://www.elekta.com/). In the past I've been involved with computer games, helped make flight simulators and even done a bit of VR. Recently I was a mature graduate in Computer Science with AI at the [University of Sussex](http://www.sussex.ac.uk/).

I live in [Worthing](http://www.visitworthing.co.uk/). I can normally be found on my laptop. I sometimes cycle, do youth work or play music.

### Links
[Current Blog](http://markpurser.blogspot.co.uk)

[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/pub/mark-purser/6/3a7/404)

### Contact
My contact e-mail address is mail at markpurser dot co dot uk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
